n = int(input())

lucas = [2, 1]

for i in range(2, n+1):
    lucas.append(lucas[i-1] + lucas[i-2])

print(lucas[n])

import numpy as np

def main():
    N = int(input())
    L = np.zeros(N+1, dtype=int)
    L[0] = 2
    L[1] = 1

    for i in range(2, N+1):
        L[i] = L[i-1] + L[i-2]
    return L[N]

if __name__ == '__main__':
    print(main())
